Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: CRT-themed biolink desktop environment

- Full desktop window system with drag, resize, maximize, minimize
- Keyboard controls: arrows (move/resize), Shift/Alt/Ctrl modifiers, Enter, Esc
- Taskbar with Start menu, pinned apps, window indicators, theme toggle, clock
- Three application windows: Analog Console, Links, Status Monitor
- Authentic CRT effects: scanlines, phosphor glow, slot mask, vignette, static
- Green and amber phosphor themes
- State persistence via localStorage
- Debug overlay (Alt+D / long-press)
- Fully responsive with viewport clamping
- Ready for GitHub Pages deployment
